metadata.description: Mr. Iori is a divorced single dad and has a son who’s in kindergarten. To comfort him， Mr. Iori’s subordinate， Hayakawa， prepares him a delicious lunch. Mr. Iori is flattered by the daring approach from the young and handsome Hayakawa， but...... This is a compilation of bittersweet love stories that play on the theme of adult sensibilities.
metadata.name: Daddy's Boyfriend (Yaoi Manga)
